scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m "$npm_package_name ($npm_package_version) ## $(date) ## " && git push origin master
scripts.docker:build: npm run flush && docker compose -p $npm_package_name up -d --force-recreate --build
scripts.docker:restart: npm run flush  && docker compose --project-name $npm_package_name up -d --build
scripts.docker:recreate: docker compose down --rmi all && docker compose --project-name $npm_package_name up -d --build
